tasks.description: READ dashboard_server.py. The /grind_logs/latest.log endpoint exists but returns 404. Find the bug and FIX IT. Common issues: (1) Route might not be registered with Flask app correctly, (2) glob might not be imported, (3) Path logic might be wrong. OUTPUT: The corrected dashboard_server.py file with the working endpoint. Test your fix by checking: does the route use @app.route? Is glob imported at the top? Does the grind_logs path resolve correctly? Write the COMPLETE fixed file as output.
